trans-unit.source: Describes a reference to a collection of XML Web services.

A <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference> object is used to pass information about a set of Web services to the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference"></xref> class with the given description document collection and proxy code namespace.

The `documents` collection should contain only <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects; the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method is unable to interpret <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> objects.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"></xref> that specifies a collection of description documents.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies a namespace for code compilation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference"></xref> class with the given data.

The `documents` collection should contain only <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects; the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method is unable to interpret <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> objects.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"></xref> that specifies a collection of description documents.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies a namespace for code compilation.
The URL key of the Web reference.
The base URL of the Web reference.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference"></xref> class with the given data.

The `documents` collection should contain only <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects; the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method is unable to interpret <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> objects.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"></xref> that specifies a collection of description documents.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies a namespace for code compilation.
The protocol used by the XML Web service.
The URL key of the Web reference.
The base URL of the Web reference.
Gets the base URL of the Web reference.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the base URL of the Web reference.
Gets the URL key of the web reference.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the URL key of the Web reference.
Gets the collection of description documents associated with the Web reference.

The description document collection associated with a Web reference should contain only <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects; the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method is unable to interpret <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> objects.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"></xref> used to initialize the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference"></xref> instance.
Gets or sets the protocol associated with the Web reference.
Allowed protocol strings include "Soap" (indicating SOAP 1.0) and "Soap12" (indicating SOAP 1.2).
The value of this property determines the protocol used by proxy clients when contacting any XML Web service in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference.Documents%2A> collection.
For more information on SOAP, see the World Wide Web Consortium Web site, at www.w3.org.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the name of the protocol associated with the Web reference.
Gets the code namespace associated with the Web reference.

The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> in which proxy code will be generated when the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences(System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceCollection,System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider,System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit,System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions)"></xref> method is called.
Gets a collection of warnings generated when validating the description documents.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> of validation warning text.
Gets a collection of warnings generated when importing Web Services Description Language (WSDL) service description documents.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportWarnings"></xref> collection of warnings generated when importing WSDL service description documents.
